base_description: Rectangular gray box with a smooth surface.
part_description: Consists of a main rectangular body and a front panel. The front panel is outlined and positioned on one side, suggesting a door or access point.
internal_interaction_description: The front panel appears to be hinged or attached to the main body, allowing it to open or close. This suggests internal storage or compartmentalization within the object, possibly supported by internal hinges or brackets.
external_interaction_description: Designed to interact with users through the front panel, allowing access to contents inside. It can be placed on surfaces, integrated into furniture, or used as a standalone storage unit in homes or offices.
